titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2859) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2003.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 98.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2859 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be read by paragraph. Bill is open to amendments.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-237, by Mr. Hastings (WA).
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 339.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - The Chair put the question on ordering the previous question on the amendment and the resolution by voice vote and announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. McGovern objected to the voice vote pending the absence of a quorum. The Chair postponed further proceedings until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 200 (Roll no. 448).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/25/2003--Passed House amended. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2859 (FY 2004 emergency supplemental appropriations).
